abstract: Primus Financial Holdings, one of the bidders for American International Group’s Taiwan unit, will appeal the regulator’s decision to block the deal, a newspaper reported on Monday.
snippet: Primus Financial Holdings, one of the bidders for American International Group’s Taiwan unit, will appeal the regulator’s decision to block the deal, a newspaper reported on Monday.
lead_paragraph: Primus Financial Holdings, one of the bidders for American International Group‘s Taiwan unit, will appeal the regulator’s decision to block the deal, a newspaper reported on Monday.

headline.main: Primus Said to Plan Appeal of Taiwan’s A.I.G. Ruling
